original_text: One day, Jesus asked his 12 disciples to come to him. He gave them authority over bad spirits so that they could send the spirits out of people. They could also make sick people well again from every kind of illness.
korean_text: 예수께서 그의 열두 제자를 부르사 더러운 귀신을 쫓아내며 모든 병과 모든 약한 것을 고치는 권능을 주시니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus asked his 12 disciples to come to him
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 자신의 12명의 제자들을 자신에게 오라고 부르셨습니다

sentences.original_text: so that they could send the spirits out of people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 사람들에게서 영들을 내쫓을 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: They could also make sick people well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 아픈 사람들을 다시 건강하게 만들 수 있었습니다
